PM Awas Yojana.description: Provides affordable housing for low-income families.
PM Awas Yojana.eligibility: Family should not own a permanent house.

PM Ujjwala Yojana.description: Free LPG connection for women from poor households.
PM Ujjwala Yojana.eligibility: BPL family and adult woman applicant.

Ayushman Bharat.description: Health insurance up to 5 lakh per family.
